Html:
Hello All,

Thanks for the nice Pattern PRISM.
I am newbie to Silverlight as well as PRISM.
I wish to know is there any built in support available to create dynamic layouts as using webparts in Silverlight 2/PRISM.
What I need to achieve here is to create movable/ collapsible views.
Also wish to know is there a way to add support for Profile Providers, Membership providers.

Thanks,
ManiX

Hi Manix,

 

The following threads discuss different approaches to create collapsible / animated views and regions:

·         Should I create a new Region behavior?

·         How to do animated view change  

·         StoryBoards And ViewModels 

 

As it is said in some of those posts, you can check the Stock Trader Reference Implementation that has some similar functionality.

 

Regarding the support for Membership and Profile providers Prism does not have any special built-in support, but if you are using ASP.NET to host your Silverlight application you should be able to use them in the ASP.NET stack.

 

Hope it helps!

 

Matias Bonaventura

http://blogs.southworks.net/matiasb

Thanks Matias, I will explore on the threads.
Thank you so much for your time in replying my question.

Regards,
ManiX
